overview: Héctor, a villager from the south of Chile disconnected from his family, avoids assisting Rosa, his mother who lies prostrate, leaving her in the care of her sister Elena who neglects her own existence because she has to take care of her. From her bed Rosa watches as time passes and her daughter is consumed by her. Rosa will subtly concoct a plan, which will change the roles of the house forever.
title: Sin lugar para el descanso
